TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeLibFuncAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Contains the that were originally imported for this method from the COM type library.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) applies this attribute to methods.
This attribute is applied when a type library is imported and should never be changed. It is only applied when the method's <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS> evaluate to non zero. The attribute is designed to be used by tools that need to know how the original <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS> were set. The common language runtime does not use this attribute.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to get the TypeLibFuncAttribute value of a method.
[!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.runtime.interop_10_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.interop_10_1.vb)] [!code-cs[ImprovedInteropSnippets#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.interop_10_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int16 flags) cil managed

Docs.param: The value for the attributed method as found in the type library it was imported from.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibFuncFlags flags) cil managed

Docs.param: The value for the attributed method as found in the type library it was imported from.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.
Gets the value for this method.
